name: Space Attack (pears416, Cyrogem, xzzhang, Sargent_Jack29, AlexanderDawisha)
name_original: Space Attack (pears416, Cyrogem, xzzhang, Sargent_Jack29, AlexanderDawisha)
description:
Space Attack is a 2v2 3D multiplayer arcade starfighter that takes place out in the wide expanse of space.

Battle against other players online as you shoot weapons, dodge obstacles, and rack up points for your team.

Leave us some feedback: Space Attack Playtesting Feedback (google.com)
